p: Aluminum chloride assay through colorimetry [ 26] was used to determine TFC of cakes from seeds, and residual water. After 15 min incubation, absorbance was determined using a UV-visible spectrophotometer at 510 nm. A blank sample consisting of distilled water was used. A rutin standard curve was used for quantification, and TFC was expressed in mg of rutin equivalents per gram of extract (mg Ru/g extract).
